name: analyze_protein_colocalization
description: Analyze colocalization between two fluorescently labeled proteins in microscopy images.

setup_commands: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni.git /tmp/biomni && cd /tmp/biomni && pip install -e . && rm -rf .git

inputs.name: channel1_path
inputs.description: Path to the first channel image file (fluorescent protein 1)

inputs.name: channel2_path
inputs.description: Path to the second channel image file (fluorescent protein 2)

output.description: Research log summarizing the colocalization analysis results and saved files
